sentence: To shoot the commercial, the director asked the actors to stand on soapboxes then stare into the cameras because the _ lifted them high to capture them..
James lifted the chair with just one arm. I guess the _ is pretty light.
James lifted the chair with just one arm. I guess the _ is pretty strong.
She was able to lift all the boxes with books but asked the neighbour to help her with the chairs, because the _ were light.
She was able to lift all the boxes with books but asked the neighbour to help her with the chairs, because the _ were heavy.
John wanted to to lift more weight with his muscles but the _ are too slim.
John wanted to to lift more weight with his muscles but the _ are too big.

The weights were harder for Elena to lift than Maria since _ worked out a lot.

Kayla lifted up her shirt and proudly displayed her piercings to Rachel.  _ was shocked.
John cannot lift the weight up to the top of the fence and he dropped it on the table. The _ is short.
John cannot lift the weight up to the top of the fence and he dropped it on the table. The _ is tall.
Gary decided to ignore the pain and lift the weight a few more times before getting his water bottle, but the _ was tempting to him.
Gary decided to ignore the pain and lift the weight a few more times before getting his water bottle, because the _ was a challenge to him.

William helped the stranger lift the box instead of Jason because _ is a lot stronger than weaker.

Monica had small muscles compared to Rachel when it came to weight lifting so _ lifted heavier weights.

The heavy weight was too much for Ryan , while Aaron lifted it with ease, since _ had trained properly.
Alexis wanted to lose weight, so she bought a bench to lift weights and a low calorie meal pack, but the _ had additives.
Alexis wanted to lose weight, so she bought a bench to lift weights and a low calorie meal pack, but the _ broke down.

Patricia was easily lifted onto the broad shoulders of Emily which meant that the smaller person was _ .

Cecily could only lift the cabbage and had to get Jenni to lift the pumpkin for her. The _ was light.
Natalie has a lot bigger muscles than Katrina because _ goes to the gym everyday to lift weights.
Natalie has a lot smaller muscles than Katrina because _ goes to the gym everyday to lift weights.
Nelson was too small to lift the box, so Samuel helped carry it and _ was thanked.
Nelson was too small to lift the box, so Samuel helped carry it and _ thanked them.

Justin didn't have the strength to lift the bricks unlike Kevin because _ had very weak muscles.

Men lifted weights at the gym while women ran on the treadmill, since _ wanted small muscles.
James could not lift the dumbbell, so he decided to lift the barbell instead because the _ is light.
James could not lift the dumbbell, so he decided to lift the barbell instead because the _ is heavy.
Victoria asked Jennifer for help as she didn't have the strength to lift it alone. _ had tried many times.
Victoria asked Jennifer for help as she didn't have the strength to lift it alone. _ helped lift it.
I decided to take the lift and not the escalator because the _ looked dirtier.
I decided to take the lift and not the escalator because the _ looked cleaner.

Katrina helped Sarah to lift the picnic table the made together, because _ is stronger.
William was so strong they could lift Steven over their head, because _ was thin.
William was so strong they could lift Steven over their head, because _ was muscular.

Laura had very large and bulky muscles but not Victoria because _ lifted extremely heavy weights.

Jennifer was much stronger than Christine but _ still was able to lift the heavy tank.

Nick usually worked out much more than Craig , so _ was unable to lift the furniture.
Joseph had a very weak grip but Ryan's was quite strong because _ often lifted a set of weights.

Emily could not lift Felicia because _ is weak.

The bird could lift a string with its beak but not a chain because the _ was heavy.
